footer_title: We will build houses with strong roots
about_subtitle: 10+ years of experience in construction </br> and 2000+ satisfied clients
about_description_1:
Chinor Group is a reliable and experienced partner in the real estate sector. The company was founded in 2015 and has been operating for 10 years, prioritizing the interests of clients. The main goal is to implement the housing and investment solutions that people dream of.

The Chinor Group team consists of highly qualified specialists. Each project is managed based on a thorough plan, and an individual approach is applied to each client. The company considers the quality of service, open communication, and responsibility as the main principles of its activities.

The most important result for Chinor Group is customer trust and long-term cooperation.
about_description_2: Our team consists of highly qualified specialists who carefully manage each project and provide an individual approach to our clients. Our goal is to earn your trust and provide you with the best service.
choose_us_reason_1_desc: We build houses based on modern architecture, from proven and durable materials. During the construction process, we strictly control each part. This approach protects our clients from hidden defects, unnecessary repair costs, and nervous problems that may arise later. As a result, you will have a strong, comfortable house that will not lose its value over the years.
choose_us_reason_2_desc: We have been operating in the real estate market for more than 10 years and have implemented many successful projects. This experience allows us to correctly plan processes, anticipate errors, and accurately understand customer needs. You won't spend time and money on the mistakes of inexperienced builders, and the result will be clear from beginning to end.
choose_us_reason_3_desc: We prioritize open and transparent relationships with clients. The terms are set without hidden fees, and obligations are defined clearly and understandably. For us, long-term cooperation is important, not one-time sales. Therefore, you will feel at ease during the process of buying a house and will not regret your decision.
form_banner_subtitle: Contact us for a free consultation
hero_project_description: We carry out construction and repair work of any complexity at a professional level. In the process of work, we use modern technologies, work with an experienced and responsible team.

reviews_description: Read the feedback and experiences of our clients who have worked with Chinor Group. Their words reflect our quality services and dedication to customers.
reviews_1_description: I personally monitored the construction process and was convinced that the houses are built with quality. Currently, the apartments are cozy and warm, and there are playgrounds for children.
reviews_2_description: Before buying a house, we thoroughly checked everything, the safety of our children and that strangers would not disturb us was very important to us. Moreover, many construction companies' documents turned out to be not in order. Chinor Group has all documents in order and transparent.
reviews_3_description: They helped me purchase an apartment on convenient terms, and gave a very large discount for 100% payment
company_description_1:
Chinor Group Development is a reliable and modern construction company in the Tashkent real estate market. Our goal is to provide you not only with a home, but also with residential complexes that will allow you to live a comfortable and peaceful life in the future.

Our major project, Jami Residence, is located in a promising area of the city and includes 14 and 16-story buildings and apartments in various areas. They are built using monolithic-frame technology, which ensures the house's durability and longevity.

Spacious rooms and high ceilings make your home look more modern and luxurious. Energy-efficient materials and advanced infrastructure will help reduce the costs of your home. Due to the complex's proximity to the city center, you can easily get to work, education, and recreation areas.

We offer terms with a 25% down payment and an interest-free installment plan of 28 months, as well as timely delivery of objects.

We will turn the life you dream of into reality.
price_page_subtitle: When choosing a house, don't let the price come first!
price_page_description:
Many people measure the purchase of a house primarily by price. This is a wrong decision.

The real value of the house is not in the price. Its real value is reflected in living comfort, safety, and future expenses. Construction quality, materials used, utility bills, repair needs, and surrounding infrastructure are more important than price.

That's why a cheap house is often expensive. The question should be asked differently: is this house safe for my family, is it protected from cold and heat, is it comfortable, and will it be easier to sell?

We don't start projects with a price. First, we will consider your needs and your life.
